chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
cn: nid
others: seq nid
pts: seq nid
Hnin: is_true (cn \notin pts)
Puniq: is_true (uniq pts)
l: Ordered.sort Label
j: state
i: state
pf: TPCCoh (getStatelet i l)
pf': TPCCoh (getStatelet j l)

Goal:
getLocal cn (getStatelet j l) = getLocal cn (getStatelet i l) -> getStC pf' = getStC pf

Premises:
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
TPCCoh = CohPred (CohPredMixin l1 l2 l3) : Coherence.cohpred (fun=> [eta nodes])
uniq = fun T : eqType => fix uniq (s : seq T) : bool := match s with | [::] => true | x :: s' => (x \notin s') && uniq s' end : forall T : eqType, seq T -> bool Arguments uniq {T} _%seq_scope
getStC : forall d : dstatelet, TPCCoh d -> CStateT
getStatelet = fun (s : state) (i : Label) => match find i s with | Some d => d | None => empty_dstatelet end : state -> Label -> dstatelet
nid = nat : Set
state = union_map Label dstatelet : Type
getLocal = fun (n : nid) (d : dstatelet) => match find n (dstate d) with | Some h => h | None => Unit end : nid -> dstatelet -> heap
Notation seq := list
Label = [ordType of nat] : ordType
Mem_map_inv : ?x \In [seq ?f i | i <- ?s] ->...-> ?T'] ?x : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts l : Label i : state j : state pf : TPCCoh (getStatelet i l) pf' : TPCCoh (getStatelet j l) |- ?T'] ?s : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts l : Label i : state j : state pf : TPCCoh (getStatelet i l) pf' : TPCCoh (getStatelet j l) |- seq ?T]
dyn_val : forall x : {x : ?A & ?P x}, ?P (projT1 x) where ?A : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts l : Label i : state j : state pf : TPCCoh (getStatelet i l) pf' : TPCCoh (getStatelet j l) |- Type] ?P : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts l : Label i : state j : state pf : TPCCoh (getStatelet i l) pf' : TPCCoh (getStatelet j l) |- ?A -> Type]
rely_loc' : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (i j : state), network_rely w this i j -> getLocal this (getStatelet j l) = getLocal this (getStatelet i l)
cast : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A B : ?C), A = B -> interp B -> interp A where ?C : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts l : Label i : state j : state pf : TPCCoh (getStatelet i l) pf' : TPCCoh (getStatelet j l) |- Type]
dyn : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A : ?C), interp A -> {x : ?C & interp x} where ?C : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts l : Label i : state j : state pf : TPCCoh (getStatelet i l) pf' : TPCCoh (getStatelet j l) |- Type]
getStC_K : forall (d : dstatelet) (C : TPCCoh d) (m : CStateT) (l : Log), getLocal cn d = st : -> m \+ log : -> l -> getStC C = m
locE : forall (i : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (k : Label) (x : heap) (y : soup), k \in dom i -> valid i -> valid (dstate (getStatelet i k)) -> getLocal n (getStatelet (upd k {| dstate := upd n x (dstate (getStatelet i k)); dsoup := y |} i) k) = x
Record protocol : Type := Protocol { nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid; plab : Ordered.sort Label; coh : cohpred nodes; snd_trans : seq (send_trans coh); rcv_trans : seq (receive_trans coh); snd_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.snd_tags snd_trans)); rcv_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags rcv_trans)) } Arguments Protocols.Protocol [nodes]%function_scope _ [coh] [snd_trans rcv_trans]%seq_scope
a_step_other : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (V : Type) (a : Actions.action W V this) (l : Label) (s1 s2 : state) (r : V) (n : nat_eqType) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1), this != n -> Actions.a_step pf s2 r -> getLocal n (getStatelet s1 l) = getLocal n (getStatelet s2 l)
Actions.step_other : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (V : Type) (a : Actions.action W V this) (l : Label) (s1 s2 : state) (r : V) (n : nat_eqType) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1), this != n -> Actions.a_step pf s2 r -> getLocal n (getStatelet s1 l) = getLocal n (getStatelet s2 l)
locCn : forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh d -> n \in nodes -> valid (getLocal n d) /\ (if n == cn then exists (s : CStateT) (l : Log), getLocal n d = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else if n \in pts then exists (s : PStateT) (l : Log), getLocal n d = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else log \notin dom (getLocal n d))
network_step_ind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : Prop), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
network_step_sind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : SProp), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
ReceiveMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), rt \In get_rt w l -> forall (i : mid) (from : nat) (pf : this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l)), l \in dom s1 -> forall (C : Coh w s1) (msg0 : TaggedMessage), tag msg0 = t_rcv rt -> [/\ find i (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) = Some {| content := msg0; from := from; to := this; active := true |}, msg_wf rt (coh_s l C) this from msg0 & let loc' := receive_step rt from msg0 (coh_s l C) pf in s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this loc' (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) i |} s1] -> network_step w this s1 s2
cohStC : forall d : dstatelet, TPCCoh d -> forall s : dynamic id, find st (getLocal cn d) = Some s -> dyn_tp s = CStateT
coh_s : forall (w : world) (l : Label) (s : state), Coh w s -> coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)
coh_coh : forall (w : world) (s : state) (l : Label), Coh w s -> coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)
Inductive network_step (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) : Prop := Idle : s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step w this s1 s2 | SendMsg : forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2 Arguments Idle [w] _ [s1 s2] Arguments SendMsg [w this s1 s2 l st] _ [to] [msg]%seq_scope [b] _ _ _ [S] Arguments ReceiveMsg [w this s1 s2 l rt] _ [i] [from]%nat_scope [pf] _ [C msg0]
SendMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (getStatelet s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) {| content := {| tag := t_snd st; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} s1 -> network_step w this s1 s2
Actions.safe_local : forall (W : world) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall s : state, Actions.skip_safe W s -> coh p (getStatelet s l)
Actions.tryrecv_act_step = fun (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)) (s1 s2 : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)) => exists pf : s1 \In Coh W, [/\ forall (l : Label) (m : mid) (tms : TaggedMessage) (from : nat) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol W l))) (b : bool), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol W l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := this; active := b |} = find m (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) -> rt \In rcv_trans (getProtocol W l) -> tag tms = t_rcv rt -> msg_wf rt (coh_s l pf) this from tms -> filter l from (t_rcv rt) tms ->...-> Prop Arguments Actions.tryrecv_act_step _ _ _%function_scope
InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.II : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (sts : seq (InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.SendInv p I)) (rts : seq (InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.ReceiveInv p I)), [seq InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.st i | i <- sts] = snd_trans p -> [seq InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.rt i | i <- rts] = rcv_trans p -> InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv p I
skip_action_wrapper : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall V : Type, (forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) -> Actions.action W V this
Actions.skip_action_wrapper : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall V : Type, (forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) -> Actions.action W V this
Coh = fun (w : world) (s : state) => [/\ valid w, valid s, hook_complete w, dom w.1 =i dom s & forall l : Label, coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)] : world -> Pred state
Actions.skip_step : forall (W : world) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall V : Type, (forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) -> forall s1 : state, Actions.skip_safe W s1 -> state -> V -> Prop
getStL_Kc : forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet) (C : TPCCoh d) (pf : n \in nodes) (m : CStateT) (l : Log), getLocal n d = st : -> m \+ log : -> l -> getStL C pf = l
getStL_Kp : forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet) (C : TPCCoh d) (pf : n \in nodes) (m : PStateT) (l : Log), getLocal n d = st : -> m \+ log : -> l -> getStL C pf = l
getStP_K : forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet) (C : TPCCoh d) (pf : n \in nodes) (m : PStateT) (l : Log), n \in pts -> getLocal n d = st : -> m \+ log : -> l -> getStP C pf = m
rely_loc : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label), network_rely w this s1 s2 -> find this (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)) = find this (dstate (getStatelet s2 l))
Record InductiveInv (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) : Type := II { sts : seq (InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.SendInv p I); rts : seq (InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.ReceiveInv p I); _ : [seq InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.st i | i <- sts] = snd_trans p; _ : [seq InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.rt i | i <- rts] = rcv_trans p } Arguments InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv _ _%function_scope Arguments InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.II [p] [I]%function_scope [sts rts]%seq_scope
step_is_local : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label), network_step w this s1 s2 -> forall z : nat_eqType, z != this -> find z (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)) = find z (dstate (getStatelet s2 l))
Actions.skip_step_total : forall (W : world) (l : Label) (p : protocol) (pf : getProtocol W l = p) (V : Type) (f : forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) (s : state) (S : Actions.skip_safe W s), exists (s' : state) (r : V), Actions.skip_step pf f S s' r
all_hooks_fire = fun (h : hooks) (l : Label) (st : nat_ordType) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) => forall (z : nat_ordType) (lc : Label) (hk : hook_type), Some hk = find (z, lc, (l, st)) h -> lc \in dom s -> l \in dom s -> hk (getLocal n (getStatelet s lc)) (getLocal n (getStatelet s l)) msg to : hooks -> Label -> nat_ordType -> union_mapUMC Label dstatelet -> nid -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop Arguments all_hooks_fire _ _ _ _ _ _%seq_scope
Actions.skip_step_sem : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (p : protocol) (pf : getProtocol W l = p) (V : Type) (f : forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) (s1 : state) (S : Actions.skip_safe W s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), Actions.skip_step pf f S s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2
getProtocol = fun (w : world) (i : Label) => match find i w with | Some p => p | None => EmptyProt i end : world -> Label -> protocol
rely_consume_other : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (from : nat), network_rely w this s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |} -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |}
Mem_map : forall (T T' : Type) (f : T -> T') (x : T) (s : seq T), x \In s -> f x \In [seq f i | i <- s]
step_consume_other : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (from : nat) (z : nat_eqType), this != z -> network_step w z s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |} -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |}
Ordered.sort = fun t : ordType => let (sort, _) := t in sort : ordType -> Type Ordered.sort is a coercion

``` 
assert (Hl: getLocal cn (getStatelet i l) = getLocal cn (getStatelet j l)).
{ apply (rely_loc' j cn l i); assumption. }
rewrite (cohStC _ pf _ Hl).
rewrite (cohStC _ pf' _ Hl).
reflexivity.
```

original: assert (Hl: getLocal cn (getStatelet i l) = getLocal cn (getStatelet j l)). { apply (rely_loc' j cn l i); auto. } rewrite (cohStC _ pf _ Hl). rewrite (cohStC _ pf' _ Hl). reflexivity.
